MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-DEC-2020 12:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8.41AM in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe, following reports of a grounded overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by MIDDAY. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.58AM on 20th December 2020.
